title: Feature request: Auto-resize iframes based on content
body: After the recent removal of the `@seamless` attribute on the `<iframe>` from the WHATWG spec:

comments.body: There is WHATWG/HTML discussion for this: https://github.com/whatwg/html/issues/555

Alternatively we could look at a new keyword for the resize[1] property, which would be useful for a <textarea> that automatically increases its height based on its content - another problem which requires JavaScript to solve.
